ppy/osu-framework.summary: Recent activities include the submission of three significant pull requests. The first pull request focuses on adding linux-arm64 build support for FFmpeg, allowing for the creation of ARM binaries without the need for emulation. The second pull request aims to enhance texture loading times by a magnitude through native macOS image loading support. The third pull request involves cleanup and optimization of Objective-C interop code, including the relocation of NSString and NSImage conversion methods and the utilization of LibraryImport instead of DllImport.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities involve updates to the MWC 7K 2025 team listing and rules. A push event incorporated changes including the update of team listings, the addition of a full player list link, the removal of duplicated headings, and the modification of the sign-up link. Associated pull requests also adjusted Round of 24-related rules to reference the Round of 32 and added initial team listings for eligible countries, contributing to the ongoing maintenance and improvement of the osu-wiki repository.
